SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM T_BOARD INNER JOIN MEM ON T_BOARD.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO INNER JOIN TB_MANAGE ON T_BOARD.TBM_NO = TB_MANAGE.TBM_NO WHERE MEM.MEM_DEL = 1 AND TBM_NM = '공지사항' AND TB_MANAGE.TEAM_NO = #{tno}
AND TB_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'

SELECT T.TB_NO, M.MEM_NM, T.TB_TITLE, T.TB_CON, T.TB_FILE, T.MEM_NO, TO_CHAR(T.TB_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TB_DT, T.TB_HIT, T.TB_UP, T.MEM_NO FROM T_BOARD T INNER JOIN MEM M ON T.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND T.TB_NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BOARD(TB_NO, TBM_NO, MEM_NO, TB_TITLE, TB_CON,TB_FILE, TB_UP, TEAM_NO) VALUES(T_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 2, #{mno}, #{title}, #{con}, #{NFile}, #{upbtn}, #{tno})
